title: [1.12.2-1.7.10][Tree Growing Simulator——跳舞树成长]不如跳舞~
author: 猜猜谁是谁
txt_content:
介绍
按shift可以加快树的成长
演示gif：
注：为了演示方便我把配置文件改成了这样：

# Configuration file

tweaks {
    # Will spawn a LOT more particles for actions near saplings.
    B:allTheParticles=true

    # Energy (in RF) that is gotten each time the engine is "bumped," meaning every time you crouch or sprint
    I:energyPerBump=25

    # Show bonemeal particles when appropriate. Not sure why you would turn this off, but eh
    B:showParticles=true

    # The amount of ticks (times 5) you must be crouching or sprinting before bonemeal is applied
    I:waitTime=5
}复制代码


原配置文件解析

# Configuration file

tweaks {
    # Will spawn a LOT more particles for actions near saplings. //每一次有效的shift都释放粒子效果
    B:allTheParticles=false

    # Energy (in RF) that is gotten each time the engine is "bumped," meaning every time you crouch or sprint //抱歉不知道
    I:energyPerBump=25

    # Show bonemeal particles when appropriate. Not sure why you would turn this off, but eh //在成长到一定过程时显示粒子效果（为了激励你？）
    B:showParticles=true

    # The amount of ticks (times 5) you must be crouching or sprinting before bonemeal is applied //每一次有效shift之后要等的再次进行有效shift的tick数（can you know 我在说什么？）
    I:waitTime=100
}




下载
原帖
百度盘 密码dfme

二搬说明
原搬运者@asd1112223335 的搬运贴因版本老旧 + 30天未上线 

根据版规4-1-1可以二搬 @U1U420039 请求删除原搬运贴

replies.txt_content: 这一条貌似意思是跳舞发电机的发电量是25rf/tick（手滑按了回车。。。）
